document_data.mainbody:
Brother Merring was a villager of West Harbor on the Sword Coast North around 1374 DR.
Originally from Neverwinter, Merring came to the village of West Harbor. He preached about Lathanders teachings (thinking it would unite the villagers), but the villagers worshiped Chauntea. He healed the fighters in the Harvest Brawl, and later the warriors who stood in the defense of West Harbor during the battle against bladelings and duergar in 1374 DR.
